text_block_list.text: On the way back from going out with Matikanetannhauser, she suddenly stopped in her tracks...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew, I really enjoyed that break to the fullest! Thank you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...So, do you have any plans after this?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Really?! Then let's go to the shopping district!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Look, it's that thing. I'm inviting you on a "hospitality" tour!
Following her lead, I ended up at the shopping district with Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I want to go to that shop over there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Taiyaki, taiyaki~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, look! It says 'Now with 30% more filling'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Not 30% off, but 30% on! We have to buy this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Hmm? That's weird~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I might have forgotten my wallet. Ugh, my taiyaki~...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eh, really?! Yay, yay! You're more generous than the taiyaki!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, well then, I'll dig in~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huff huff! Munch!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...It's soooo hot!?
(Thud~~~)
Startled by the heat, Matikanetannhauser landed hard on her butt...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ouch ouch ouch. Phew~, that surprised me...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I agree! Let's pawn to the park!
……By the time we finished eating the taiyaki in the park, the sun had already set completely.
I wonder when Matikanetannhauser's "hospitality" will begin……?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the taiyaki.
Well then――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Let's head back before it gets dark!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, you're surprised, aren't you?
Even though it's a "hospitality tour," we just walked around the shopping district normally.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But this is my "hospitality"!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because I'm just plain ordinary through and through, with nothing outstanding about me…….

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But you scouted me even though I'm like that, so I thought maybe ordinary me is the best.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And also…… special days are fun, but I love the ordinary, everyday moments!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So today, ordinary is number one for me too!
Ordinary, ba~~nzai!
choice_data_list: That was a wonderful hospitality that's so like you
That was a wonderful hospitality that's so like you
What an exciting kind of ordinary!
What an exciting kind of ordinary!
I hope you stay the same from now on

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So today, ordinary is number one for me too!
Ordinary, ba~~nzai!
choice_data_list: That was a wonderful hospitality that's so like you
That was a wonderful hospitality that's so like you
What an exciting kind of ordinary!
What an exciting kind of ordinary!
I hope you stay the same from now on

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I can't believe you'd say that to me!
I'm happy and surprised!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This makes me feel like I have to provide even more amazing hospitality…….

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
……But that's impossible for me, isn't it?
Ahaha~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So, please keep accepting ordinary me from now on!
Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I was thinking the same thing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: When I'm with you, Trainer, even the usual things make me feel all excited.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's like…… ordinary things become even better ordinary things.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, let's keep getting excited together from now on!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So today is a celebration of staying the same, huh…….
Fufufu, I feel like making a toast~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Ah, but there's no drink. Aww~ I did it again.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: In that case... I'll go with an air toast! Clink our fists together—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Cheers~!
